column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I had heard great things about this place and happened to end up there for dinner during happy hour on my first visit. The happy hour menu was an incredible deal - each small plate was only $2-3 and we got a pitcher of sangria for $16. All of the tapas were great with the bacon wrapped dates
column4: and beef empanada most notable. They also have pretty decent bread and olive oil at the table as well which is a nice touch.
